api_list.name: search nearby
business details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yelp-com.p.rapidapi.com/business/DAiqwrmv19Uv-I1bOoAJCQ"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yelp-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://yelp-com.p.rapidapi.com/business/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yelp-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yelp-com.p.rapidapi.com/reviews/{business_id}/highlights"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yelp-com.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
